marklogic.body: It's been months and I still can't stop listening to them, in fact becoming inspirit after this album it's 4.5/5 for me! BE MINE as title track is just perfect BECAUSE is just love of 1st listen to me, well done leader WOOHYUN's time is just mind blowing You never thought that AMAZING and JULIA are actually sad songs with refreshing rhythm HOYA&DONGWOO bring back Epik High style which I miss L's voice bring uniqueness SUNGJONG&SUNGYEOL are getting more lines as they are improving! TIC TOC is just my favorite song all time, it's so different Their dance is magnificent and can be compared with SHINEE but sychronization hands down to INFINITE their themes/concepts are not like any other groups, they bring something new to the table even though they are not from big company, all the MVs are well done I'm Glad that they are getting recognition that they deserve since they debut Seriously, what could you ask for more from INFINITE except you are hoping to watch their concerts? I proudly say that I have INFINITE album because they are worth it <3
